input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design

Product specifications:
Made of 14 gauge Steel
Comes with 60 in. Mounting rod
Antique copper Finish
Sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement
Garden Mount Only
input_text.Response A: The Garden Mount Weathervane is a magnificent piece that will add a touch of elegance to any outdoor space. It is crafted from high-quality, durable steel and comes with a striking antique copper finish. The weathervane is made to last, and it will endure the test of time. It comes with a mounting rod that is 60 inches long, making it easy to install on any property. The sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement, allowing the weathervane to accurately predict the direction of the wind. The Garden Mount Weathervane is the perfect addition to any garden, and it will be a focal point that will catch the attention of everyone who visits.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
